As of today, in terms of entrepreneurs and official institutions, we target mainly remote places and low visited countries - such as Subsaharianna Africa, South-America, Oceania -  in order to develop entrepreneurship, economic growth, employment  and last but not least, green tourism.

Players can play against friends in public and private leagues, and earn badges as they play.

product_desc:
The American Campus (TAC) is a new institution of higher education designed to offer a high quality, cost-effective American education to Mauritian students and others from across Africa and Asia. It was founded by a broad coalition of U.S. educators with substantial and varied experience, and is based on the American model of active and applied academic learning.

TAC provides a superior educational experience to nurture students’ personal and career goals and to qualify them at graduation for immediate entry into the workplace, and launch them on a significant track in their chosen career. We achieve this by being well-informed about trends and opportunities in the regional job markets, and by collaborating with American university partners to offer meaningful programs on campus. Besides academic experience, students at TAC gain a supporting network of mentors, and build relationships with potential employers through internships, community service learning and applied research.

name: IntelliCUP

IntelliCUP offers high speed beverage dispensing solutions with integrated payment processing, facilities management and monitoring systems

The IntelliCup™ solution comprises the IntelliCup™, IntelliKeg and IntelliApp.

The IntelliHub is the web portal that allows licensees, partners, merchants and agents to securely sign-in and access the IntelliCUP™ online system. Through the IntelliHub, merchants are able to remotely set each IntelliHeads beverage description, pour volume and price as well as view and clear account balances.  

The IntelliApp is the customer interface with the IntelliCUP™ system. To benefit from the full system, users may register as a user via the App. This will allow users to effortlessly dock a cup with any IntelliHead receiving quick, consistent perfectly served drinks, without the use of cash or interaction with bar staff.

Integrating with current vendor management systems, Bloom fills a critical gap by providing feedback of an informal, private, and incentive-free nature through proactive notifications and simple interactions.

How it works?

We have integrated handwriting recognition, speech to text and swipe technology in the application to enhance the doctor interaction with the tool. The doctor can also attach audio recordings of the consultation, high definition images and videos as well as draw a sketch. This ensures that the doctor focuses on the patient and interacts minimally with the device so as to improve doctor-patient relationship.

Doctor Assistant was the first Android application ever launched on Google Play which was coded by two practicing medical doctors who later founded Amakemb Ltd. The success of this application has been phenomenal in Mauritius and regional African countries which readily adopted the EMR for making their practice go paperless. Doctor Assistant has been published in the World Health Organisation (WHO) Compendium of Innovative Health Technologies.

name: AESOP Energy
product_desc:
AESOP Energy LLC is a spinout of the non-profit AESOP Institute creating revolutionary cost-competitive energy systems to accelerate replacement of fossil fuels.

We are completing conversions of Tecumseh and Mitsubishi-Chrysler V6 gasoline engines to fuel-free operation. Powered by atmospheric heat, a huge, untapped, 24/7 reservoir of solar energy, these engines open doors to emergency generators and household power that needs no fuel. 

Fuel-Free Piston engines and Turbines running 24/7 can scale to large sizes and replace power provided by fossil fuels. Fuel-free turbines will provide vehicles including aircraft with unlimited range.

AESOP is also prototyping room temperature Ultraconductors.
status: See the current Executive Summary at http://www.aesopinstitute.org

name: Pantomime
product_desc:
The Pantomime Platform™ on iOS, Android, Mac, Windows, and VR headsets lets users reach into virtual worlds using their mobile devices and computers -- making the usual display headsets optional.

Pantomime thus lifts the key barriers to mass adoption of virtual reality by consumers: easy access, reaching in, sharing, and mobility.

Pantomime’s patented software turns every consumer computer into a virtual reality portal, resolving the key obstacles to widespread consumer adoption of shared VR and enabling lucrative telepresence services.

Pantomime™ lets users see and reach into shared virtual worlds:
• users’ devices and even their animated virtual hands are visible, to them and everyone in the virtual world
• their mobile devices become powerful, accurate controllers, tools to reach into VR;
• and if they do have a VR headset, Pantomime lets them reach into the shared scene in gyro-accurate 3D using most any mobile device.
high_concept: Software that Lets Anyone Reach into Augmented Reality
markets: Mobile Games, Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality
status: Pantomime across consumer devices provides interactive Virtual Worlds for 21st century Ubiquitous Computing. goo.gl/QSu8Vo

name: Stratalis
product_desc:
Stratalis offers web scraping services and software to organizations that need to exploit information available on the web. Our solutions include all-inclusive web scraping services and a groundbreaking web scraping platform.

Our Data-as-a-Service offers help businesses obtain valuable data without having to deal with the technical aspects. Our clients only need to specify what data they need and where to get it from: Stratalis then builds the necessary data extraction robots and delivers quality-controlled data feeds at the required frequency.

To deliver upon its promises, Stratalis uses its soon-to-be-released Espion web scraping platform. Its comprehensive feature set makes it easy for any programmer to scrape the most complex web sites. Espion is built on standard web technologies (JavaScript, jQuery) so that all web developers can use it effectively with no learning curve.

To find out more about our technology visit http://espion.io
markets: Enterprise Software, B2B, Big Data, Programming

name: Hip Chick Farms
product_desc:
Hip Chick Farms brings healthy great-tasting poultry products to time challenged families seeking convenient real food based on trusted ingredients.

Kids LOVE chicken nuggets – moms hate feeding their families food made from suspect ingredients!   Meals made from scratch take time and families are busier than ever, so convenience is a driving factor in frozen food purchasing.  A growing sector of wholesome food shoppers want to understand where their food is coming from but rarely find such information in frozen foods.  

Hip Chick Farms is addressing an attractive growing market with easy, convenient and affordable quality frozen food made with ingredients sourced from real farmers.  Our hand-crafted organic delicious chicken fingers, chicken meatballs, chicken wings and gluten free chicken nuggets are all made with impeccable ingredients that emphasize sustainable, humane practices.

name: Reyner Media
product_desc:
Unlike "generic" presentation tools like PowerPoint, Salestrip was created with the needs of sales people at the core. 

A study in the journal of Technical Communication revealed that 36% of the time spent creating presentations was spent designing slides. For Sales professionals, this time that could have been SELLING. 

With Salestrip, you just insert your content and the system automatically generates dozens of professionally designed slides...in just a click!

But it goes beyond slides, open spec sheets or price lists right inside your presentation, send them on the fly and even take internal notes...WITHOUT EVER LEAVING THE PRESENTATION. These Sales focussed features are not found in Powerpoint, Keynote, Prezi....or any other generic presentation tool available today.

The Starter account allows users to activate their account for free and the FREE partner program allows us to leverage on the existing client base of partners.

name: Knol
product_desc:
Knol is a beautiful private knowledge base solution. It allows you to create all your knowledge bases under one interface and easily distribute them over multiple content management systems. 

In essence, Knol integrates perfectly with platforms such as Wordpress, Magento and Prestashop and allows for the posting of tutorials under their dashboards or backoffice.

Knol can also help businesses in managing the way they document their processes. 

Knol.io thus is a platform to promote the creation, sharing and leveraging of organisation’s knowledge.

name: Sophie's Kitchen
product_desc:
Sophie's Kitchen is the first company to make plant-based seafood alternatives using innovative ingredients and patent pending technology. 
According to Mintel, sales of meat alternatives reached $553 million in 2012 in conventional channels, natural supermarkets, and specialty supermarkets. This represents 8% growth of meat alternative sales from 2010. 
While only 7% of consumers identify as vegetarian, some 36% of consumers surveyed by Mintel in March 2013 indicated use of meat alternatives measured in this report. In addition, less than half of consumers who use meat alternatives are using the products in place of real meat, and 16% indicate using the products alongside meat offerings. These statistics point to participation in the category that stretches beyond necessity and beyond simple meat restriction. It suggests the opportunity for future growth by successfully meeting general consumer food interests.
markets: Food and Beverages, Natural Food Grocers, Restaurant, Food Trucks And/Or Restaurants

name: One Moja
product_desc:
One Moja is a virtual distribution network of approximately 1 million private payroll customers. This allows for marketing, origination and collection of financial products offered. 

The private payroll market is not currently the main focus of any of the financial service providers and therefore these employees are underserved and do not have products readily available to them. 
We provide the customer base with instant access to affordable financial products without the need to travel. The virtual solution also removes the high costs involved in requiring a physical distribution network.

Any of the virtual financial products offered are marketed and issued directly to this network, and payments are securely collected from the employers.

We have designed a business model which benefits all role players involved to ensure it is sustainable. Only if the service provider, private companies and the employees benefit together, will a model in this market become sustainable.
high_concept: Distribution Network of 1 million Customers in East Africa for Financial Products
status: One Moja - June 2014 starts lending and collected its first installments

name: SleepOut.com
product_desc:
SleepOut.com connects travellers with accommodation hosts in Africa. SleepOut has adapted existing peer-to-peer and hotel booking models for emerging markets. Offline payments, mobile money and pay later options extend SleepOut’s offering to the millions of Africans without credit cards (estimated at 99% of the population).

SleepOut.co.ke was launched in June 2012 originally serving only Kenya. SleepOut.com was thereafter launched in October 2013 and now lists 6,000+ accommodation options across 60 countries currently highly concentrated around East and Southern Africa.

SleepOut.com is a high performance, highly scalable custom-built PHP mobile web application with heavy reliance on test-driven development and clean code. 

Built responsively, SleepOut uses SMS and email so that any host with a phone or email can publish their accommodation on the marketplace. Hosts can publish and fully manage their listings and bookings via their dashboard.
markets: Online Travel, Peer-to-Peer, East Africa, South Africa
